item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“Castles, post:8, topic:421023”][quote author=tyb97 link=topic=523698.msg3809849#msg3809849 date=1320800390]

Dude come on its my first server :\ this is the server where im just learning to code, we’ve all been there.

Yeah, if its your first server, don’t upload it, there is too many leeched servers out there… So I wouldn’t worry about this, go to server coding, code some commands.
[/quote]
Not trying to argue, but unfortunately he needs a cache to load his client to test those commands. :P[/quote]
The cache should not need to update its already on his comp derp.

b00mz1029:

Iv been working on the server awhile just trying to figure this part out lol, starting like tomorrow I’m uploading a blank server and coding from there.

Then why do you need the cache updated? I’m just trying to save you time…

Read full topic

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Im trying to change it so when people download my cache it downloads my new cache but whenever I change the link in cachedownloader and try to run my client it says, Error loading… Please report someone pleaase help, this is what I did in my cachedownloader.java file

import sign.signlink;

public class CacheDownloader {

private client client;

private final int BUFFER = 1024;

private final int VERSION = 2; // Version of cache
private String cacheLink = "https://dl-web.dropbox.com/get/HaizScapecache.zip?w=18d72fec"; // Link to cache

private String fileToExtract = getCacheDir() + getArchivedName();

public CacheDownloader(client client) {
	this.client = client;
}

I changed that link to that.

Read full topic
